mapper.select: SELECT EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO FROM EMP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP(EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) VALUES(#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, SYSDATE, #{sal}, 0, #{deptno})
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET ENAME=#{ename}, JOB = #{job}, MGR = #{mgr}, SAL = #{sal}, COMM = #{comm}, DEPTNO = #{deptno} WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
